card.title: K-Buddy AI Learning Companion
card.description: AI-powered learning companion for the education sector that offers instant explanations, quiz generation, and personalized assessments through a voice/text chatbot, with full deployment completed in three months.

summary.title: Case Study Summary
summary.text: K-Buddy is an AI chatbot for an India-based education client that delivers personalized support across Learn, Practice, and Assessment via a voice/text interface integrated into the learning platform. Built in three months with document indexing and instant explanations, it cut query resolution time by 70%, increased student satisfaction by 35%, and boosted after-hours engagement by 60%-showcasing how AI chatbots and eLearning solutions scale real-time, contextual help.

challenge.title: Challenge
challenge.text: Lack of scalable, interactive AI learning tools to support students with contextual, real-time learning assistance and assessment.

goals.title: Goals
goals.text: Deliver AI chatbots for personalized academic support. Enhance student engagement and reduce dependency on human intervention using flexible eLearning solutions.

solution.title: Solution
solution.text: Voice/text-enabled chatbot interface for modern learning platforms.
details: Upload and index documents (PDFs, PPTs, etc.)
Learn: Instant concept explanations, summaries, and examples
Assessment: Personalized tests and performance feedback

implementation.title: Implementation
implementation.text: Chatbot trained and tested; full deployment in 3 months.

results.title: Results
results.text: Student query resolution time decreased by 70%
details: Student satisfaction improved by 35% (based on feedback forms)
24/7 availability led to a 60% increase in after-hours engagement
Over 50% of students reported better understanding through AI-guided interactions

testimonial.quote: "K-Buddy makes studying so much easier. I can ask questions anytime and get clear answers without waiting for help."
testimonial.author: Riya Sharma, Undergraduate Student

keyTakeaway.title: Key Takeaway
keyTakeaway.text: K-Buddy shows how AI chatbots-embedded within eLearning solutions and learning platforms-can personalize learning through features like Learn, Practice, and Assessment, significantly improving engagement, understanding, and efficiency.

cta.title: Access K-Buddy AI Chatbot Case Study
cta.description: Discover how AI chatbots and eLearning solutions scale personalized support, boosting student engagement and understanding in real-time. If you're in education technology or student support, this case shows how AI-powered learning solutions can transform study experiences and outcomes.
